pullrequest.title: Use the new install workspace for ignition transport on Windows

content.raw: We have all the versions numbers hardcoded in the zip files. We don't have to tackle it in this pull request but it would be nice that if we use a different version in one of the dependencies we shouldn't have to modify the .bat script.
content.html: We have all the versions numbers hardcoded in the zip files. We don't have to tackle it in this pull request but it would be nice that if we use a different version in one of the dependencies we shouldn't have to modify the .bat script.
